attributes.action: We request a new public Inquiry into mass rape/grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details:
The details that have come out from the atrocities committed throughout Great Britain have made me feel physically sick. 
We must do everything we can to protect our youth.
attributes.background: We, the British people request an immediate, new and in depth inquiry into the rape/grooming gangs.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
